member.name: P:LSPD_First_Response.Mod.API.PedPursuitAttributes.MaxDrivingSpeed
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum driving speed.

member.name: P:LSPD_First_Response.Mod.API.PedPursuitAttributes.MinDrivingSpeed
member.summary: Gets or sets the minimum driving speed.

member.name: P:LSPD_First_Response.Mod.API.PedPursuitAttributes.HandlingAbility
member.summary: Gets or sets the improvement to the suspect's handling for general driving.

member.name: P:LSPD_First_Response.Mod.API.PedPursuitAttributes.HandlingAbilityTurns
member.summary: Gets or sets the improvement to the suspect's handling when turning.

member.name: P:LSPD_First_Response.Mod.API.PedPursuitAttributes.MaxTurnAggressiveness
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum modifier for the suspect's aggressiveness to take turns

member.name: P:LSPD_First_Response.Mod.API.PedPursuitAttributes.MinTurnAggressiveness
member.summary: Gets or sets the minimum modifier for the suspect's aggressiveness to take turns

member.name: P:LSPD_First_Response.Mod.API.PedPursuitAttributes.SurrenderChanceCarBadlyDamaged
member.summary: Gets or sets the surrender chance after a severe crash that caused the suspect's vehicle to be damaged.

member.name: P:LSPD_First_Response.Mod.API.PedPursuitAttributes.SurrenderChancePittedAndCrashed
member.summary: Gets or sets the surrender chance after a PIT that caused the suspect to crash.

member.name: P:LSPD_First_Response.Mod.API.PedPursuitAttributes.SurrenderChancePittedAndSlowedDown
member.summary: Gets or sets the surrender chance after a PIT that caused the suspect to slow down.

member.name: P:LSPD_First_Response.Mod.API.PedPursuitAttributes.SurrenderChancePitted
member.summary: Gets or sets the surrender chance after a PIT.

member.name: P:LSPD_First_Response.Mod.API.PedPursuitAttributes.SurrenderChanceTireBurst
member.summary: Gets or sets the individual surrender chance that is evaluated once per tire burst.

member.name: P:LSPD_First_Response.Mod.API.PedPursuitAttributes.SurrenderChanceTireBurstAndCrashed
member.summary: Gets or sets the surrender chance after a crash shortly after a tire had burst.

member.name: P:LSPD_First_Response.Mod.API.PedPursuitAttributes.HandlingAbilityBurstTireMult
member.summary: Gets or sets how much the suspect's driving ability is affected by a single burst tire. See for more.

member.name: P:LSPD_First_Response.Mod.API.PedPursuitAttributes.AverageBurstTireSurrenderTime
member.summary: Gets or sets the average time in seconds to surrender when at least one tire is burst.

member.name: P:LSPD_First_Response.Mod.API.PedPursuitAttributes.BurstTireSurrenderMult
member.summary: Gets or sets how much the average surrender time of a suspect is affected by a single burst tire. See for more.

member.name: P:LSPD_First_Response.Mod.API.PedPursuitAttributes.BurstTireMaxDrivingSpeedMult
member.summary: Gets or sets how much the maximum driving speed is affected by a single burst tire. A value of 0.25f would reduce the driving speed to 0f when all four wheels on a vehicle are destroyed, whereas a value of 0.5f would have the same result after just two burst tires.

member.name: P:LSPD_First_Response.Mod.API.PedPursuitAttributes.AverageSurrenderTime
member.summary: Gets or sets the average time in seconds until a ped will surrender during a pursuit. This depends on the pursuit situation, e.g.a suspect far away will notevaluate this chance.

member.name: P:LSPD_First_Response.Mod.API.PedPursuitAttributes.AverageFightTime
member.summary: Gets or sets the average time in seconds until a ped will fight cops during a pursuit. This depends on the pursuit situation, e.g.a suspect far away will not evaluate this chance.

member.name: P:LSPD_First_Response.Mod.API.PedPursuitAttributes.MaxRunningSpeed
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum speed.

member.name: P:LSPD_First_Response.Mod.API.PedPursuitAttributes.ExhaustionDuration
member.summary: Gets or sets the amount of time before a suspect becomes exhausted.

member.name: P:LSPD_First_Response.Mod.API.PedPursuitAttributes.ExhaustionInterval
member.summary: Gets or sets the amount of time a suspect stays exhausted.

member.name: P:LSPD_First_Response.Mod.API.PedPursuitAttributes.CanUseCars
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the suspect can use vehicles.

member.name: T:LSPD_First_Response.Mod.API.Events.PedSwitchedAnimatedWeaponEventHandler
member.param: The weapon that was switched to. Null if the weapon was holstered/unequipped.

member.name: T:LSPD_First_Response.Mod.API.Events.PursuitSuspectEscapedEventHandler
member.param: The handle for the pursuit the suspect has left.
The suspect. Null if suspect is not in a scenario and has been deleted.
The suspect vehicle skin. Null if suspect was not in a vehicle when escaping.
Whether or not the suspect is currently busy in a scenario assigned after escaping. It is not recommended to control suspects that are in a scenario.

member.name: T:LSPD_First_Response.Mod.API.Events.PedPresentedIdEventHandler
member.param: The pullover instance the ped is currently assigned to, if any.

member.name: T:LSPD_First_Response.Mod.API.Events.PursuitPedHasVisualChangedEventHandler
member.param: Whether or not the ped is visible to any police unit.
Whether visual was just lost. If this is false, visual has been lost for a moment and the search behavior is about to start.

member.name: T:LSPD_First_Response.Mod.API.Events.PedLookedUpEventHandler
member.param: The ped that was looked up. Null if not found.
The persona of the ped that was looked up. Can be valid for non-existing peds, for instance when a ped was previously known to the player but has since been deleted. Null if not found.

member.name: T:LSPD_First_Response.Mod.API.Events.VehicleLookedUpEventHandler
member.param: The vehicle that was looked up. Null if not found.

member.name: E:LSPD_First_Response.Mod.API.Events.OnPedSwitchedWeaponAnimated
member.summary: This event is invoked when a Ped equips or unequips a weapon using our holster animations.

member.name: E:LSPD_First_Response.Mod.API.Events.OnPulloverTalkingToPedAvailable
member.summary: This event is invoked for every tick the player is able to talk to a ped during a pullover. This means that the helpbox prompting them to talk to a ped is showing and they are not already talking to the ped.

member.name: E:LSPD_First_Response.Mod.API.Events.OnPulloverTalkingToPed
member.summary: This event is invoked for every tick the player is talking to a ped during a pullover. This means that the pullover interaction menu is active.

member.name: E:LSPD_First_Response.Mod.API.Events.OnPursuitPedHasVisualChanged
member.summary: This event is invoked every time all police units have lost visual on a given ped or at least one police unit just regained visual. It is also called again a short time after visual has been lost before, to indicate that the search behavior is about to start as indicated by the last parameter.

member.name: T:LSPD_First_Response.Mod.API.Functions.OnDutyStateChangedEventHandler
member.summary: The event handler for when the on duty state has changed.

member.name: E:LSPD_First_Response.Mod.API.Functions.OnOnDutyStateChanged
member.summary: Event fired when the on duty state has changed.

member.name: E:LSPD_First_Response.Mod.API.Functions.PlayerWentOnDutyFinishedSelection
member.summary: Event fired after the player went on duty and finished all associated steps such as selecting an outfit or a car. The player is idle at this point. Does not fire when forcing duty.

member.name: M:LSPD_First_Response.Mod.API.Functions.AddPedToPursuit(LSPD_First_Response.Mod.API.LHandle,Rage.Ped)
member.summary: Adds to .

member.summary: Creates a pursuit.

member.name: M:LSPD_First_Response.Mod.API.Functions.ForceEndPursuit(LSPD_First_Response.Mod.API.LHandle)
member.summary: Ends if still running.

member.name: M:LSPD_First_Response.Mod.API.Functions.GetAllUserPlugins
member.summary: Returns an array of all currently loaded user plugins loaded by LSPDFR. These assemblies are loaded into the byte context and thus can be used for manual assembly resolving.

member.name: M:LSPD_First_Response.Mod.API.Functions.GetActivePursuit
member.summary: Gets the active pursuit instance. Returns null if player is not actively involved into a pursuit.

member.name: M:LSPD_First_Response.Mod.API.Functions.GetCalloutFriendlyName(LSPD_First_Response.Mod.API.LHandle)
member.summary: Gets the friendly name reprensentation of a callout that is used for LSPDFR Sync.

member.name: M:LSPD_First_Response.Mod.API.Functions.GetNameOfSeat(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the name LSPDFR uses to describe a vehicle seat during pullovers, for instance driver or left rear.

member.name: M:LSPD_First_Response.Mod.API.Functions.GetVehicleOwnerName(Rage.Vehicle)
member.summary: Gets the name of the owner of .

member.name: M:LSPD_First_Response.Mod.API.Functions.GetVersion
member.summary: Gets the LSPDFR version currently running.

member.name: M:LSPD_First_Response.Mod.API.Functions.IsCalloutRunning
member.summary: Gets whether a callout is running.

member.name: M:LSPD_First_Response.Mod.API.Functions.IsPlayerPerformingPullover
member.summary: Gets whether the player is performing a pullover.
member.returns: Whether player is performing a pullover.

member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether a lethal force policy has been set.

member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether lethal force is forced for the pursuit.

member.summary: Gets a value whether is still running.

member.name: M:LSPD_First_Response.Mod.API.Functions.IsPedStoppedByPlayer(Rage.Ped)
member.summary: Returns whether the ped was stopped by the player for interaction.

member.name: M:LSPD_First_Response.Mod.API.Functions.IsPedVisualLost(Rage.Ped)
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether visual has been lost on a ped. See for when visual has been lost for a moment already.

member.name: M:LSPD_First_Response.Mod.API.Functions.IsPedVisualLostLonger(Rage.Ped)
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether visual has been lost for a moment and the last known position is being searched.

member.name: M:LSPD_First_Response.Mod.API.Functions.RemovePedFromPursuit(Rage.Ped)
member.summary: Removes a ped, either a suspect or a cop, from a pursuit. Note that to prevent cops from rejoining the pursuit, use .

member.name: M:LSPD_First_Response.Mod.API.Functions.RegisterCallout(System.Type)
member.summary: Registers a callout of type to the callout manager to make it being processed with all LCPDFR callouts.

member.name: M:LSPD_First_Response.Mod.API.Functions.RequestBackup(Rage.Vector3,LSPD_First_Response.EBackupResponseType,LSPD_First_Response.EBackupUnitType,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Requests and creates a new backup unit at or around .
member.param: The position where the unit should be created.
The response type of the unit.
The agency script name of the agency to respond. Use for automatic selection.
Whether or not the unit should spawn at the exact location specified.
Whether or not a backup task should be assigned to the unit.
member.returns: A backup unit if successful. Null otherwise.

member.name: M:LSPD_First_Response.Mod.API.Functions.RequestBackup(Rage.Vector3,LSPD_First_Response.EBackupResponseType,LSPD_First_Response.EBackupUnitType,System.String)
member.summary: Requests and creates a new backup unit at or around .
member.param: The position where the unit should be created.
The response type of the unit.
The agency script name of the agency to respond. IF the script name is invalid, no unit will be created.
member.returns: A backup unit if successful. Null otherwise.

member.name: M:LSPD_First_Response.Mod.API.Functions.SetCopAsBusy(Rage.Ped,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets as busy or not. A busy cop will not respond to nearby events, such as pursuits.
member.param: Whether or not the cop is busy.

member.name: M:LSPD_First_Response.Mod.API.Functions.SetPedAsCop(Rage.Ped)
member.summary: Makes LSPDFR recognize as a ped. Best to use this right after ped creation.

member.name: M:LSPD_First_Response.Mod.API.Functions.SetPedAsArrested(Rage.Ped)
member.summary: Sets the ped as arrested.

member.name: M:LSPD_First_Response.Mod.API.Functions.SetPedAsArrested(Rage.Ped,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets the ped as arrested.
member.param: Whether or not the ped should be cuffed.

member.name: M:LSPD_First_Response.Mod.API.Functions.SetPedCantBeArrestedByPlayer(Rage.Ped,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Prevents the player from being able to stop and arrest the altogether.

member.name: M:LSPD_First_Response.Mod.API.Functions.GetIsAudioEngineBusy
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the audio player is busy.

member.summary: Plays audio over LSPDFR's police radio using a game position. Any instances of 'POSITION' in will be replaced by the audio file for
member.param: The string containing all sounds. Use whitespace to separate.

member.summary: Plays all audio actions in using LSPDFR's police radio.
member.param: The string containing all sounds. Use whitespace to separate.
